data.description: A String search interface to FreeDB
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Like already discussed. (Thread :"namespace request:
    Net::FreeDBSearch")

    "Most of what's in WWW::* now fits that definition well and there's
    pleanty of scope for more. By adding WebService:: we reduce the risk
    of future bloat to both the Net::* and WWW::* categories." (Tim
    Bunce)

    WebService::FreeDB is a module using the Web Interface of the
    www.freedb.org to search for keywords in the cd database.
